```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(mosaic)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
data5 <- read_excel("~/Desktop/2018 亚马逊销售情况/5月/2018May1-2018May31CTR.xlsx")
```

```{r}
Mayclean <- data5 %>%
  filter(!is.na(quantity))

May <- Mayclean %>%
  group_by(description) %>%
  summarise(n()) %>%
  filter (str_detect(description, "Backpack"))
```
